original_text: While Jesus and his disciples were eating, he took a loaf of bread. He thanked God for it and then he broke the bread into pieces. He gave some of it to each of them. He said, ‘Take this bread and eat it. This is my body.’
korean_text: 그들이 먹을 때에 예수께서 떡을 가지사 축복하시고 떼어 제자들에게 주시며 이르시되 받아서 먹으라 이것은 내 몸이니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: While Jesus and his disciples were eating
he took a loaf of bread
and then he broke the bread into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그는 빵을 조각들로 나누었다

sentences.original_text: He gave some of it to each of them
Take this bread and eat it
